name: Rock, Paper, Scissors
description:
Game made for the LowRezJam 2017 event

Beat your opponents in this classic Rock, Paper, Scissors game. Play the storyline and beat the bosses, to unluck new players for you and your friends to use in the versus mode.

Player 1 Controls:

  • Rock ["A"]
  • Paper ["S"]
  • Scissors ["D"]

Player 2 Controls:

  • Rock ["B"]
  • Paper ["N"]
  • Scissors ["M"]
